info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central McDowell County through 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marion, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Lake James, Nebo, Sugar Hill, Woodlawn and Pleasant Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
